subject: P0/P1 Phase Complete - Strategic Direction Needed
content:
MELO project status: P0 phase fully complete (6/6 tasks), P1 high priority complete (2/2 tasks). All worker slots available. No pending tactical work identified. 

Request strategic direction: 
1. Additional P1 tasks to execute? 
2. Begin P2 planning? 
3. Production deployment validation? 

All autonomous execution completed at current phase level. Awaiting next phase priorities.
